FaqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqSection.subtitle: We are here to help you

question1.title: What is Resiliant Material?
question1.answer: Resiliant Material is a sustainable and durable material designed for various applications.

question2.title: How do I care for my Resiliant Material products?
question2.answer: Simply clean with a damp cloth and avoid harsh chemicals.

question3.title: Where can I buy Resiliant Material products?
question3.answer: You can purchase our products directly from our website or authorized retailers.

question4.title: What is the warranty on Resiliant Material products?
question4.answer: We offer a 2-year warranty on all our products against manufacturing defects.

question5.title: Can I return or exchange my Resiliant Material products?
question5.answer: Yes, we accept returns and exchanges within 30 days of purchase, provided the product is in its original condition.
